Enter Class Name, Course Number, and select the Period. This information will be used to create the title of the space that will be generated in Webex Teams. If you need to change anything, you’ll be able to edit this information later.

Period

Enter the scheduling information for this class. Using this infomartion, a series of meeting from now until the end of the year will be created. Don’t worry, you can make changes later.
